Magnetic fields should not protect atmospheres
Simple physics: A magnetized planet captures more energy from the solar wind
• A magnetic field gives a larger cross-section
• Energy transferred to the atmosphere along magnetic field (e.g. aurora!)
• Escape is efficient, but non-global
